entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 11:49 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 8:38 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
